summary: This document discusses a meeting between ODACID POLIT officer Michael H. Martuffi and IOS, an engineering consultant, regarding Natolo Ray's training effort in Costa Rica. It also mentions IOEN's knowledge of Central American situation, his connection to Manolo Ray, and a boat he bought in Puerto Rico. The document further identifies IDEN as Zachary De Caster of Smith and Gillespie FUCISEFES, Jacksonville, Florida.
title: Cables regarding activities in Central America and identification of individuals
